description: Product Description High Vis Safety Vest with 12 Colour Options - EN-Certified for Versatile Use tay visible and protected in all conditions with our premium high-visibility vest, designed to meet European safety standards. Available in 12 distinct colour variations including Yellow, Orange, Blue, Black, Pink, White, Grey, Green, Navy, Yellow/Navy combo, Orange/Navy combo, Red, and Purple. **Safety Compliance:** - Yellow & Orange options certified to EN ISO 20471 Class 2 standard (ideal for roadwork and low-light environments) - All other colours meet EN 17353 B3 certification (perfect for daytime visibility in urban areas) **Multi-Scenario Protection:** Perfect for construction professionals, cycling commuters, event stewards, warehouse staff, school crossing patrols, dog walkers, and outdoor enthusiasts. Suitable for: • Road maintenance & traffic control • Early morning/late evening jogging • Cycling safety in urban areas • Airport ground operations • Municipal waste collection • Emergency response coordination • Outdoor festivals & crowd management **Practical Features:** - Full-length hook-and-loop closure for secure fit adjustment - Universal sizing accommodates various body types - Lightweight breathable fabric for all-day comfort - Compatible with workwear layers and equipment belts - Machine-washable for easy maintenance **Enhanced Visibility Design:** - Contrast colour panels for 360° recognition - Durable reflective detailing maintains effectiveness Choose your preferred colour variant for professional safety compliance or personal visibility needs. Ideal for workplace requirements, community events, and active lifestyles across multiple environments. Emergency Contact Tag Integrated into Collar This high vis vest features a dedicated emergency identification panel at the collar for critical information storage. The durable, weather-resistant tag provides: - **Instant Accessibility**: Bright red "EMERGENCY CONTACT" header ensures immediate visibility for first responders - **Customizable Field**: Write-on surface accommodates medical alerts, supervisor numbers, or shift codes Ideal for high-risk environments requiring rapid emergency coordination – from construction zones to remote fieldwork. Reinforced Wide Hook-and-Loop Closure System This hi vis vest features an extra-wide hook-and-loop fastening strip along the front placket, designed for superior adjustability and secure retention. The upgraded closure system provides: - **Glove-Friendly Operation**: Textured surface allows easy grip for workers wearing protective gloves - **Weather Resistance**: Maintains adhesion integrity in rain, wind, or dusty conditions Ideal for dynamic work scenarios requiring repeated vest removal/reapplication – from security checkpoints to temperature-controlled environments. EN ISO 20471-Certified Fluorescent Fabric Technology This hi vis jacket utilizes advanced high-visibility material engineered to meet strict EN ISO 20471 standards, ensuring optimal daytime and low-light recognition: - **Ultra-Bright Fluorescence**: Chromatic yarns maximize light absorption/emission for 360° daytime visibility Ideal for environments requiring persistent visibility – from motorway maintenance to airport apron operations. AYKRM Yellow, Orange, Blue, Black, Pink, White, Grey, Green, Navy, Yellow/Navy combo, Orange/Navy combo, Red, and Purple hi vis vest AYKRM HIGH VIS VEST Enhanced Work Application Scenarios Designed for professionals requiring reliable visibility across industries: • **Logistics & Delivery Drivers** – Ensure safe loading/unloading in depot yards • **Railway Maintenance Crews** – Enhanced track-side visibility during daylight operations • **Port & Dock Workers** – Critical visibility for cargo handling operations • **Mining/Quarry Staff** – Daylight conspicuity for vehicle interaction zones • **Utility Service Teams** – Gas/water/electricity infrastructure repairs • **Highway Cleanliness Patrols** – Roadside litter collection with traffic proximity • **Retail Stockroom Teams** – Improved visibility in high-bay warehouse environments • **Agricultural Workers** – Farm machinery coordination & livestock management • **Car Park Attendants** – Safe movement in busy vehicle circulation areas • **Building Surveyors** – Site inspections with professional safety compliance • **Film/TV Production Crews** – Location safety for outdoor shoots • **Disaster Response Units** – Team identification during flood/storm recovery **All-Environment Adaptability:** Maintains performance across challenging conditions: - Compatible with hi-vis trousers for full EN-compliant kits - Non-restrictive design accommodates repetitive movements **Customized Visibility Solutions:** - **Two-tone variants** (Yellow/Navy, Orange/Navy) enhance contrast recognition - **Dark colour options** (Navy/Black) reduce dirt visibility in industrial settings - **Bright hues** (Pink/Red/Purple) enable team differentiation on complex sites Ideal for corporate PPE procurement programmes requiring EN-standardised options across multiple departments.
